docs.snippet: Donald Trump could draw the United States into nuclear war, Hillary Clinton warns. Clinton would plunge the country into a constitutional crisis, he says....

docs.snippet: Mexico's peso could plunge more than 10 percent to a record low against the dollar in a matter of weeks if Donald Trump wins the U.S. presidential election on Nov. 8, according to a Reuters poll of currency strategists published on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexico's peso could plunge more than 10 percent to a record low against the dollar in a matter of weeks if Donald Trump wins the U.S. presidential election on Nov. 8, according to a Reuters poll of currency strategists published on Tuesday.

headline.main: Mexico Peso Seen Plunging 10 Percent if Trump Wins U.S. Election-Reuters Poll

docs.snippet: Only days before the presidential election, the FBI released an archive of documents from a long-closed investigation into Bill Clinton's 2001 presidential pardon of a fugitive financier, prompting questions from Hillary Clinton's presidential cam...
docs.lead_paragraph: Only days before the presidential election, the FBI released an archive of documents from a long-closed investigation into Bill Clinton's 2001 presidential pardon of a fugitive financier, prompting questions from Hillary Clinton's presidential campaign about its timing.

headline.main: FBI Release of Bill Clinton Archive Raises Timing Questions

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton is not the only one playing defense after the FBI's disclosure last week of additional emails relevant to its probe of her use of a private email server. Other Democrats are under the gun, too, in dozens of down-ballot races that w...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton is not the only one playing defense after the FBI's disclosure last week of additional emails relevant to its probe of her use of a private email server. Other Democrats are under the gun, too, in dozens of down-ballot races that will determine whether they control the House and Senate next year.

headline.main: Democrats Weigh Down-Ballot Drag of Clinton Email Saga
headline.print_headline: Democrats Weigh Down-Ballot Drag of Clinton Email Saga
